general.quote: Your strength is within you.
Every sunrise is a new opportunity.
Peace begins with a smile.
Happiness is found within, not outside.
Kindness costs nothing but means everything.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
Courage is grace under pressure.
Resilience is built through challenges.
A calm mind brings inner strength.
Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
Be the change you wish to see in the world.
Small steps every day create big results.
Patience is the companion of wisdom.
Your body listens to your mind—speak with kindness.
Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
Where there is love, there is life.
Success is not final; failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Time heals almost everything; give it time.
Silence is sometimes the best answer.
Do good and good will come to you.
Inner peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person to control your emotions.
Your potential is endless.
Dream big, work hard, stay humble.
The best way out is always through.
Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
Don’t compare your chapter 1 to someone else’s chapter 20.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Joy is not in things; it is in us.
Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react.

hindu.quote: The body is a temple; honor it with care.
Perform your duty without attachment to the results.
Balance in body and mind brings peace.
When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
A gift is pure when it is given from the heart to the right person at the right time.
Change is the law of the universe.
Man is made by his belief. As he believes, so he is.
Self-control is the key to freedom.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
There is nothing lost or wasted in this life.
The soul is neither born, and nor does it die.
He who has no attachments can really love others.
Yoga is the journey of the self, through the self, to the self.
Knowledge is better than ritual worship.
Detachment leads to freedom.
A person is made by their faith; whatever faith they have, that they are.
Truth alone triumphs, not falsehood.
Peace comes from within; do not seek it without.
Those who are motivated only by desire for the fruits of action are miserable.
No one who does good work will ever come to a bad end.
The mind acts like an enemy for those who do not control it.
Meditation is better than mechanical rituals.
Rise above duality and live in balance.
A person’s own duty, though imperfect, is better than another’s duty perfectly performed.
Renounce the fruits of action, and you will attain peace.
The self is your true friend and your true enemy.
Calmness, gentleness, silence, self-restraint—these are the disciplines of the mind.
One who sees inaction in action, and action in inaction, is wise.
He who has conquered his mind is the greatest warrior.
The wise see all beings with equal vision.

islamic.quote: Allah does not burden a soul beyond its capacity.
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
And He found you lost and guided you.
Be patient, for your patience is with Allah.
The best among you are those who bring greatest benefits to others.
Patience is a pillar of faith.
Do not lose hope, nor be sad.
Kind words and forgiveness are better than charity followed by injury.
Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him.
Verily, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
Your Lord has not forsaken you.
Charity extinguishes sins as water extinguishes fire.
The strong person is not the one who overcomes others, but the one who controls himself in anger.
Speak good or remain silent.
Every soul will taste death.
Allah loves those who are patient.
Do not waste, for Allah does not love the wasters.
The best among you are those who learn the Quran and teach it.
Whoever relies upon Allah – He is sufficient for him.
Forgive others as you would like Allah to forgive you.
The most beloved deeds to Allah are those done regularly, even if small.
Do not grieve; indeed Allah is with us.
Prayer is the key to Paradise.
Your wealth and your children are but a trial.
And whoever puts his trust in Allah, then He will suffice him.
The best of you are those best to their families.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
Make things easy and do not make them difficult.
Smiling in the face of your brother is charity.
And Allah is the best of planners.

christian.quote: You are fearfully and wonderfully made.
Cast all your anxiety on Him because He cares for you.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
Be strong and courageous; do not be afraid, for the Lord your God is with you.
Love your neighbor as yourself.
The truth will set you free.
Do to others as you would have them do to you.
The Lord is close to the brokenhearted.
Be still, and know that I am God.
We walk by faith, not by sight.
God is love.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God.
The peace of God will guard your hearts and minds.
Give thanks in all circumstances.
Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find.
The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
Faith can move mountains.
Let all that you do be done in love.
My grace is sufficient for you.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart.
Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
God will never leave you nor forsake you.
Rejoice always.
The Lord gives strength to His people.
Blessed are the peacemakers.
The Lord is good to all.
Let your light shine before others.
Come to me, all who are weary, and I will give you rest.
Nothing is impossible with God.

sikh.quote: Recognize all of mankind as a single caste of humanity.
In the company of saints, peace is obtained.
He who has no faith in himself can never have faith in God.
Truth is high, but higher still is truthful living.
Where there is forgiveness, there is God Himself.
The world is a drama, staged in a dream.
One who conquers the mind, conquers the world.
Those who have loved are the ones who have found God.
In ego they go, and in ego they come.
Sing the Name of the Lord, and find peace.
Why call her bad? From her, kings are born.
God is one, but His forms are many.
Kindness is the essence of worship.
Without the Name, no one finds peace.
He alone is a true king who has no attachment.
Humility is the word, forgiveness is the virtue.
The Lord Himself creates and watches over all.
Shed your pride, and embrace humility.
Even kings and emperors, with heaps of wealth and vast dominion, cannot compare with an ant filled with the love of God.
Remember God, and all your affairs will be resolved.
Death would not be called bad, O people, if one knew how to truly die.
Speak only that which will bring you honor.
The whole world is His creation.
He alone is wise who serves others.
Without God’s Name, life is useless.
Sing His praises with devotion.
Blessed is that household where the Name is sung.
The true guru shows the path to liberation.
Service to others is the highest religion.
Meditation brings bliss.

buddhist.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
No one saves us but ourselves. We must walk the path.
Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love.
Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
The root of suffering is attachment.
Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
If you light a lamp for somebody, it will also brighten your path.
There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path.
Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
You only lose what you cling to.
Every morning we are born again. What we do today matters most.
An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
The trouble is, you think you have time.
Happiness never decreases by being shared.
Delight in meditation and solitude. Compose yourself, be happy.
All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
A jug fills drop by drop.
The greatest prayer is patience.
True love is born from understanding.
Conquer yourself rather than a thousand battles.
Pain is certain, suffering is optional.
Meditate … do not delay.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Let go of fear, and you will find freedom.
